data.name: Brave Witches: Grape Juice for Your Eyes
data.short_description: The Witches are preparing for a large-scale attack on the Neuroi nest, and to do that they'll need a new weapon. This new weapon is being transported via a supposedly safe route. Krupinski is given the task of defending the convoy. Some of the younger members are a little worried about the always-

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
